description: A nod to paniolo (cowboy) and ranching culture found in island upcountry, this sandal is a dapper addition to any out?t. Made with high-character, full-grain leather, and embroidery inspired by the stitching on Hawaiian saddles, you’ll feel the workmanship in every step. Made for the beach, not the ocean—prolonged contact with water may cause damage.
name: Olukai Mekila - Mens
